entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
